title: Machine Learning Competency Strengthening: Pediatric Physical Therapy Professional Capacity Building Program

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Apply physical assessment techniques according to developmental stages in pediatric patients with over 80% accuracy
Resolve at least three communication issues arising during pediatric physical therapy using virtual case-based scenarios
Achieve over 70% on formative assessment criteria for developing treatment plans using digital tools and physical devices (e.g., assistive technology) in hybrid learning environments
Practice collaborative treatment approaches with families of pediatric patients through role-play simulations at least twice
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
